statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - x - 3 , -14 \, x^{3} - 10 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 12 , -2 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 3 , 4 \, x^{3} + 8 \, x^{2} + 6 \, x - 6 , x^{2} - 6 \, x - 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
